description: Document does not describe operators for compute capability filter and aggregate filter.
title: Document does not describe operators for compute capability filter and aggregate filter

comments.content: Document does not describe operators for compute capability filter and aggregate filter. Aggregate filter needs a little more description, too.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jsuh

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/12584
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 611ee3b213409d07f2569ce8d600fb0ec105d4be
Author: Jinwoo 'Joseph' Suh <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 11 11:28:51 2012 -0400

    Added description of operators for extra_specs
    
    There are several new operators added for extra_specs that are used
    in compute capability filter and aggregate filter. These are
    described in document in this patch. Fixed bug 1047036.
    
    Change-Id: Id86c6672d7bda458ecb918f1900d6f8a9526ad41
